snippet: Prime Minister Nuri Kamal al-Maliki told demonstrators on Wednesday to stop their protests or face government action.
abstract: Iraq's Prime Min Nuri Kamal al-Maliki tells demonstrators to stop their protests or face government action, contending that protests were being hijacked by groups to harm the national interest.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Nuri Kamal al-Maliki told demonstrators on Wednesday to stop their protests or face government action.

headline.seo: Iraq: Maliki Demands That Protesters Stand Down
headline.main: Iraq: Maliki Demands That Protesters Stand Down
headline.print_headline: Iraq: Maliki Demands That Protesters Stand Down
